parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: The ref of the element that should be displayed in fullscreen mode.

returnValues.name: enter
returnValues.description: Requests the browser to display the target element in fullscreen.

returnValues.name: exit
returnValues.description: Exits fullscreen mode for the document.

returnValues.name: isFullscreen
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if the target element is currently fullscreen.

returnValues.name: toggle
returnValues.description: Switches between entering and exiting fullscreen based on current state.
